price: y les dio la más hermosa figura que quiso para ustedes.
arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratin mā shāa rakkabaka
